query:
SELECT t.householdId, COUNT(*) as taskCount, h.name as householdName
FROM tasks t 
LEFT JOIN households h ON t.householdId = h.id
WHERE t.assignedTo IS NOT NULL 
GROUP BY t.householdId, h.name
ORDER BY taskCount DESC
LIMIT 5
